welcome.title: Discover everything that matters to you in one place, bringing you the latest ads from various fields.
welcome.subtitle: Browse carefully selected ads from jobs, fashion, services, real estate, products, and more.

footer.aboutUs: A digital platform for classified ads that acts as an intermediary between sellers and buyers, aiming to facilitate the process of supply and demand through a smooth and secure user experience.
footer.copyrightText: All Rights Reserved for Wesal Website

home.tagline: Thousands of ads... everything you need in one place
home.title: Certified Mediator for Contractors, Workers, and International Search
home.subtitle: Discover reliable services from certified contractors and workers throughout the region

hero.title: Certified intermediary between advertiser and client for
hero.subtitle: From handicrafts to jobs, real estate, and various products… we provide you with a unified space that brings together all the ads that may interest you, so you can compare, choose, and apply for what suits you best with ease and clarity.
hero.heroOptionOne: Explore thousands of diverse ads in one place, from jobs to products and services. Easily search for everything you need without hassle and start applying quickly.
hero.heroOptionTwo: Through a massive library containing thousands of ads from various fields, we provide you with a smooth browsing experience that helps you find what you're looking for—whether it's a product, service, or job opportunity—all in one platform that brings together all your needs.
